item.title: [REALEASE]the sword jagex forgot to make[RELEASE]first model ever
item.dc:creator: @sanga282 sanga282

theres probably a reason they forgot to make this

item.title: [REALEASE]the sword jagex forgot to make[RELEASE]first model ever
item.dc:creator: @rip4d rip4d
item.description:
@rip4d wrote:

If you’re going to recolor something, atleast heavily edit it. Make it so most people can’t tell what you began with for it. And if you can’t even do that, I suggest to practice. But seriously, most people here would even prefer a simple model from scratch rather than a decent looking recolor, so work on your REAL modeling skills

Read full topic
item.source: [REALEASE]the sword jagex forgot to make[RELEASE]first model ever

item.title: [REALEASE]the sword jagex forgot to make[RELEASE]first model ever
item.dc:creator: @Assassins_Creed_Fan Assassins Creed Fan
item.description:
@Assassins_Creed_Fan wrote:

[quote=“thegratebob2, post:5, topic:287636”]ya but at least the world can now use it ;D[/quote]Dude, everyone could make this even if they don’t have any modeling skills…
You can just change the Mat colours in your Material Panel on Metasequoia and whoop, you’re done…
I know that you are trying to help us, but we already have the knowledge of recoloring.
And we are trying to get past of recolours.
Be creative.

Read full topic
